gobblin.metastore.database

Class DatabaseJobHistoryStoreV100

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metastore.database.DatabaseJobHistoryStoreV100
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VersionedDatabaseJobHistoryStore, JobHistoryStore, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @SupportedDatabaseVersion(isDefault=true,
                          version="1.0.0")
public class DatabaseJobHistoryStoreV100
extends Object
implements VersionedDatabaseJobHistoryStore
    An implementation of JobHistoryStore backed by MySQL.

    The DDLs for the MySQL job history store can be found under metastore/src/main/resources.
